text: I found that datasets rst files where duplicated in 2 different places in nilearn code base : nilearn/description and nilearn/datasets/description. I kept the latter as it's used in the get datasets function docstring.

text: @lesteve the description was indeed empty. Renaming to oasis.rst fixed the issue.
oasis1 should probably be called oasis1.rst. Double check by using nilearn.dataset.fetch_oasis_vbm() and checking that the returned bunch has a non empty .description field.
Can you add a test for oasis similary to what @AlexandreAbraham has done in #802?
I'll add the test myself directly in master.
